title: PartAsBuilt
description: JSON Schema for Part As Built in Catena-X Traceability (placeholder)

catenaXId.description: The unique Catena-X ID for the part as built

partAsPlannedId.description: The Catena-X ID of the related Part As Planned

manufacturingDate.description: The date and time when the part was manufactured

manufacturerId.description: The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the manufacturer

serialNumber.description: The serial number assigned to the part by the manufacturer

batchId.description: The batch ID for the part (if applicable)

partInstance.description: Additional characteristics of the part instance

manufacturingCountry.description: The country code where the part was manufactured

manufacturingPlant.description: The plant identifier where the part was manufactured
